mapper.insert: insert into t_member(member_id, m_password, m_name, nick, tel, birth, email, gender) values(#{memberId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{nick}, #{tel}, to_date(#{birth},'yyyymmdd'), #{email}, #{gender})
mapper.select: select member_id, m_password as password, m_name as name, nick, tel, to_char(birth, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as birth, email, gender from t_member where member_id=#{value}
